title: RFA “Fully Focused” on Building New First Stage for 2025 Launch Attempt
summary:
German launch services provider Rocket Factory Augsburg (RFA) is currently focused on building a new first stage for the inaugural flight of its RFA ONE rocket. The stage that was initially earmarked for the flight was destroyed during a static fire test. On 19 August 2024, RFA conducted an integrated static fire test of the […]
The post RFA “Fully Focused” on Building New First Stage for 2025 Launch Attempt appeared first on European Spaceflight.
